page.title: 01POPULATION
page.content: THE PEOPLE OF THE AREA. GLENRIDDING IS A SMALL COMMUNITY IN THE LAKE DISTRICT SITUATED ON THE SOUTHERN TIP OF LAKE ULLSWATER. THERE ARE ABOUT 300 INHABITANTS, MANY OF WHOM WORK IN THE TOURIST INDUSTRY IN SOME WAY. BECAUSE OF THE SURROUNDING NATURAL BEAUTY OF THE AREA, GLENRIDDING HAS ATTRACTED MANY RETIRED PEOPLE INTO COMING TO LIVE HERE. AWAY FROM YHE COMMUNITY OF GLENRIDDING ITSELF, THERE ARE ONLY A VERY FEW SETTLEMENTS, MOST OF WHICH ARE OWNED BY THE NATIONAL TRUST. MUCH OF THE AREA IS MOUNTAIN AND MORELAND. PEOPLE HAVE LIVED HERE FOR MORE THAN A THOUSAND YEARS, BUT PROBABLY ONLY IN VERY SMALL NUMBERS IN THOSE DAYS.
